name: Bug Report or Feature Request
description: Submit a bug report or request with detailed information.
title: ''
labels: bug, enhancement
assignees: ''
---

### Description

Please provide a clear and concise description of the issue or feature request. Be nice and courteous when describing the problem or suggestion.

### Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
1. Include the `openapi.json` (or YAML) file that demonstrates the issue.
2. Define the expected or desired behavior.
3. Ideally, include a written test or message that illustrates the problem.
4. Optionally, create an example based on one of the servers in the `tests/test_servers` directory.

### Additional Context
If desired, you can create a new server based on the examples in `tests/test_servers` to explain what you mean. This will help us better understand the issue and incorporate it into testing.

### Environment
- **OS:**
- **Python Version:**
- **Other Relevant Details:**

### Screenshots or Logs
If applicable, add screenshots or logs to help explain your problem.

### Additional Notes
Thank you for taking the time to submit this report. We appreciate your effort in helping us improve!
